statements: SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_templates;
SELECT id, employee_id, date_added FROM hand_geometry_templates;
SELECT id, employee_id FROM hand_geometry_templates WHERE date_added < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_templates WHERE employee_id = 12345;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_templates FROM hand_geometry_templates GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT id, employee_id, hand_geometry_data FROM hand_geometry_templates WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_templates WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, employee_id, hand_geometry_data FROM hand_geometry_templates ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT id, employee_id, hand_geometry_data FROM hand_geometry_templates WHERE date_added BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT id AS template_id, employee_id AS user_id, hand_geometry_data AS hand_data FROM hand_geometry_templates WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_templates;
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM employee_details WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT hand_id, employee_id FROM hand_geometry_templates WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT name, department FROM employee_details WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employee_details;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_templates JOIN employee_details ON hand_geometry_templates.employee_id = employee_details.employee_id WHERE hand_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM employee_details WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT hand_id, employee_id FROM hand_geometry_templates WHERE employee_id = 100 ORDER BY hand_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_templates WHERE hand_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT employee_id, name FROM employee_details WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM hand_geometry_templates WHERE hand_id = 1);
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1
SELECT full_name, department FROM employees
SELECT department_name FROM departments
SELECT * FROM hand_geometry_templates WHERE employee_id = 2
SELECT full_name, position FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT'
SELECT * FROM employees
SELECT full_name, department FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager'
SELECT * FROM departments WHERE department_name = 'HR'
SELECT employee_id, full_name FROM employees ORDER BY full_name DESC
SELECT employee_id, full_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY full_name
SELECT * FROM HandGeometryData ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, hand_template FROM HandGeometryData WHERE employee_id = 123
SELECT * FROM EmployeeData WHERE department = 'HR'
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM EmployeeData WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT department_name, supervisor_id FROM DepartmentData
SELECT * FROM HandGeometryData WHERE employee_id = 123
SELECT department, COUNT(*) FROM EmployeeData GROUP BY department
SELECT id, hand_template, created_at FROM HandGeometryData WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT ed.first_name, ed.last_name, dd.department_name FROM EmployeeData ed JOIN DepartmentData dd ON ed.department = dd.department_name
SELECT sd.full_name, dd.department_name FROM SupervisorData sd JOIN DepartmentData dd ON sd.supervisor_id = dd.supervisor_id
SELECT * FROM EmployeeHandGeometries
SELECT employee_id, hand_template_data FROM EmployeeHandGeometries
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM EmployeeDetails
SELECT department_name FROM Department
SELECT employee_id, department_id FROM EmployeeDepartment
SELECT * FROM EmployeeHandGeometries;
SELECT employee_id, hand_template_data FROM EmployeeHandGeometries WHERE hand_template_data IS NOT NULL;

SELECT EmployeeDetails.first_name, EmployeeDetails.last_name, Department.department_name FROM EmployeeDetails JOIN EmployeeDepartment ON EmployeeDetails.employee_id = EmployeeDepartment.employee_id JOIN Department ON EmployeeDepartment.department_id = Department.department_id;
SELECT EmployeeAccessLog.employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM EmployeeAccessLog GROUP BY EmployeeAccessLog.employee_id;

SELECT EmployeeDetails.first_name, EmployeeDetails.last_name, EmployeeAccessLog.access_time FROM EmployeeDetails JOIN EmployeeAccessLog ON EmployeeDetails.employee_id = EmployeeAccessLog.employee_id WHERE EmployeeDetails.first_name = 'John';
